colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA DZAMBHA LA DMAR PO CHAGS PA RDO RJE'I SGRUB THABS RJES GNANG BYA TSUL 'DZAD MED 'DOD DGU'I GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, RIG 'DZIN GTER BDAG GLING PAS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DOD BUM LAS GSUNGS PAS GZHI BYAS, DRIN CAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA'I PHYAG BZHES KYIS BRGYAN TE, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM DU MAR PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MSOS SKU 'BUM GSER TOG BLA BRANG GI GZIMS CHUNG BKRA SHIS GA-YANG 'KHYIL GYI YANG RTZER SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
